      • getRoomByDirection

                        throws NoRoomInThisDirectionException
        Parameters:
        d - direction of the room we want
        Returns:
        the room corresponding to the given direction
        Throws:
        NoRoomInThisDirectionException - if the given direction is not assigned to the room
